footer.description: This is the site referring to the R2L2 project, a line follower robot made in the simplest possible way, using an arduino uno. This is a university project, whose purpose is to learn in practice. This site will serve as a kind of documentation, so that anyone can replicate the project, as all the steps and decisions taken will be documented here.
